original: aom smar smar bi sma na ska ra mah'a dza ba h'um zhes brjod cing rin po che brdar bas rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i char dpag tu med pa nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsams la dbul lo //
analyzed: aom smar smar bi sma na ska ra mah'a dza ba h'um zhes brjod cing rin po che brdar bas rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa'i char dpag tu med pa nam mkha'i khams gang bar bsams la dbul lo //
translated: Reciting Om smar smar vismaran skaram maha jvālā hūṃ, imagine that the space element is filled with an immeasurable rain of precious parasols, victory banners, and so forth, and offer them.
